name: demonstrator
content:
demonstrator noun [C]
(PERSON SHOWING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who explains how something works or how to do something: A demonstrator was showing customers how the food processor worked.

demonstrator noun [C]
(PROTESTER)
a person who marches or stands with a group of people to show that they disagree with or support something or someone: Police arrested several of the demonstrators.

Add to word list
a person who marches or stands with a group of people to show that they disagree with or support something or someone: Several demonstrators were arrested when they sat down in the middle of Broadway.
